report_title: KJET Kisumu County Application Ranking and Evaluation

applications.applicant_name: Kisumu Central Tea Factory Outgrowers SACCO

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: SACCO registered >3 yrs (since 2005) with clear governance (Score 5).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Active off-take contract with factory; stable B2B demand (Score 5).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear plan for transport/handling efficiency; quantified targets/timelines present (Score 4).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Additional VC (Tea); fills critical aggregation/logistics node (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Strong inclusion (50% women, 30% youth); 1-2 green practices (sustainable farming advisory) (Score 4).

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: MSME Association, rapid growth, inferred 1-3 years of documented leadership/operations (Score 4).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Consistent sales to recyclers (B2B); growing channels (Score 4).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Strong plan (paletizing unit/recycling plant); major investment goals (Score 4).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Additional VC (Blue Economy - waste management); fills critical processing/value addition node (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: High women/youth participation (51%+ W, 50%+ Y); implied green practice (waste recovery) (Score 5).

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Association registered >3 yrs (since 2015) with functioning governance (Score 5).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Consistent monthly B2B and B2C orders; growing channels (incl. digital) (Score 4).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Plan to upgrade equipment; clear objective; targets present (Score 4).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Construction - metal works); fills critical fabrication/supplies node (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Low women participation; some intent on sustainability (waste scrap recycling) (Score 3).
